texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.Permission:Author: Author
texts.IntroduceTable: ALPHA Library provides you with an interface to manage the objects in the library
texts.IntroduceCategory: Display information, add, edit, delete, search for categories in the library
texts.IntroduceAuthor: Display information, add, edit, delete, search for book authors in the library
texts.IntroduceReader: Display information, add, edit, delete, search for readers to borrow books from the library
texts.IntroduceBlock: Display information, add, edit, delete, search for library book blocks, manage which blocks are empty/available/full
texts.IntroduceBorrow: Display information, add, edit, delete, search for borrowed books of all readers, manage return/unreturn books
texts.IntroduceBook: Display information, add, edit, delete, search for books in the library
texts.IntroduceChart: ALPHA Library makes statistics, gives charts to optimize the management in the library
texts.Thanks: To create the ALPHA library, Alpha team would like to sincerely thank the leader
texts.SelectAnotherAuthorForThisBook: Existing book with same name and author
texts.InvalidBookName: Existing book with same name and author
texts.Required_NumberBook: Number Book In Block is required
texts.Search_Reader: Enter name, age, address, phone, email, id card
texts.Search_Block: Enter name, number book, capacity, available space
texts.AvailableSpace_Error: Please enter the number is greater than or equal capacity minus number book in block
texts.Capacity_Error: Please enter the number is greater than or equal numberBookInBlock
texts.NumberBookInBlock_Error: Please enter the number is less than or equal capacity
texts.Search_Borrow: Enter date borrow, date return, name book, reader
